dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.evt.SecurityEventEndpoint
dataStructure.description:
Represents an IP address and a port in a connection during a security event

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityEventEndpoint

child.name: port
child.description:
The IP port associated with the IP address in the translation

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is mandatory

This attribute is AVC enabled
child.label: port

child.name: endpointRole
child.description:
Defines the role of the endpoint in the Security Event. Possible enumeration values: Source, InternalSource, TranslatedSource, or Destination.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: endpointRole

child.name: ipAddress
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association IPAddressAssignedToSecurityEventEndpoint

This association end is optional
child.label: ipAddress

child.name: signatureSecurityEvent
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityEventEndpointInvolvedInSignatureEvent

This association end is optional
child.label: signatureSecurityEvent

child.name: netFlowSecurityEvent
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityEventEndpointsInvolvedInNetFlowSecurityEvent

This association end is optional
child.label: netFlowSecurityEvent

child.name: nATSecurityEvent
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association SecurityEventEnpointsInvolvedInNatSecurityEvent

This association end is optional
child.label: nATSecurityEvent
